md:
giải nghĩa từ "stingy" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Stingy (adjective) - keo kiệt, bủn xỉn
	+ Meaning: unwilling to spend money or give things to others because you want to keep them for yourself.
	+ Example: My brother is so stingy, he never wants to lend me any money.
	+ Related words: miserly, parsimonious, frugal, thrifty.

* Stingy (noun) - cú đốt, vết đốt
	+ Meaning: a sharp, painful wound or mark made by an insect, especially a bee or wasp.
	+ Example: I got a stingy on my arm from a bee yesterday.
	+ Related words: sting, bite, prick, puncture.

Note: The adjective "stingy" is more commonly used than the noun "stingy".

  • Stingy (adjective) - keo kiệt, bủn xỉn

  • Stingy (noun) - cú đốt, vết đốt

    • Meaning: a sharp, painful wound or mark made by an insect, especially a bee or wasp.
    • Example: I got a stingy on my arm from a bee yesterday.
    • Related words: sting, bite, prick, puncture.

Note: The adjective "stingy" is more commonly used than the noun "stingy".
